Blackbox Connect

Blackbox Connect is a two-week, intense Silicon Valley immersion program for top 12 international entrepreneurs.

Tweet

  • Blackbox Connect

  • February 18th, 2013
    Silicon Valley
  • Apply »

  • Dates:

  • Jan 13, 2013
    Fill out the application by that date. The sooner the better, we accept applicants on an ongoing basis.
  • Jan 18, 2013
    You will hear from us by this date. If not, it means you didn't get accepted to the program.

  • What you get:

  • Lectures, Workshops and all Learning Materials
  • Accommodation in Blackbox Mansion during the program
  • Light breakfasts and lunches each weekday and some dinners
  • Organized visits to successful Silicon Valley startups & tech companies
  • Airfare, visas and transportation from and to the airport are not included!

  • Program Fees

    (Due by Jan 31, 2013)
  • $6,495 / Founder
  • $9,495 / Company (2 Founders)
  • Scholarships sponsored by Blackbox Investor Club members are available for selected companies (determined individually).

While you are here you experience the secret sauce of Silicon Valley: its people. For two weeks you will live in Blackbox Mansion and take part in an intense agenda of meetings and workshops with inspiring serial entrepreneurs, investors, experts, and executives.

How to apply?

If you have founded a startup outside of the US and you seek to establish US-based business operations or launch globally, fill out the application form here. We will accept only 12 founders, and maximum 2 candidates from each country.

We look for founders and teams that have proven traction on their home markets, are serious about raising money in Silicon Valley, and are open to learn how to do business the Silicon Valley way.

We evaluate applications on an ongoing basis. We offer a limited number of scholarships funded by the members of Blackbox Investor Club. Eligibility for the scholarship is determined individually for each application.

Selected Speakers of Blackbox Connect Programs

Program Curriculum

Interfacing with an Investor | workshops
  • Top Ten Mistakes Made in Business Plans
  • Short Building Elevator Pitching Preparation and Workshop
  • Perfecting Your Investor Pitch
  • How to Hold an Investor Meeting
  • Recruiting and Leveraging an Advisory Board
Customer and Product Development | workshops
  • Understanding your customer
  • Acting on Customer Needs
  • Metrics: An introduction to qualitative vs. quantitative research
Managing Teamwork | workshops
  • Scrum Simulation Workshop
Basics of Venture Capital | managing partners & founders of veteran SV VC firms
  • Investment Options & Founder Vesting
  • Equity & Stock Options for Startup Founders
  • Introduction to Equity & Term Sheets
Challenges of Born-Global Startups | talks
  • Building the Core Team, Recruiting and Scaling
  • Lean UX and UX Principles
  • Leveraging Social Marketing
Silicon Valley Startup Ecosystem | local serial entrepreneurs and successful investors
  • Global Perspective on Investments
  • Raising Money in Silicon Valley
  • First Hand Founders Success Stories
Legal and Administrative Aspects of US-based business
  • Setting up US-based Business Step-by-Step
  • Legal Issues of Born-Global Startuos
Get Out of Blackbox
  • Startup Crawls: visit local Silicon Valley startups at different stages and listen to first-hand stories of their journeys.
  • Visit VC firms: understand the philosophies and strategies of Silicon Valley investors, learn first hand how the investors think and what they look for in startups.
  • Networking Dinners held at the Blackbox Mansion and around Silicon Valley.
  • Meet with Silicon Valley potential customers and users.

Ruben Timmeran the Netherlands

November 2011 Alumn

Blackbox Connect has changed the scope of my ambition and the speed of our development as a company, and of myself as founder. We've since expanded into Germany and Russia after our first steps into the UK and Belgium. The Russian site is being locally run by a business partner who I met because we were both participating in the first BC, so that's a very concrete example of growth coming out of Blackbox!

So what started as a local training course comparison site in The Netherlands, is now actually becoming the "Amazon of Learning".

Ismael Nzouetom France

April 2012 Alumn

These two weeks at the Blackbox Mansion was a unique and exceptional experience. It's really changed my mindset. I arrived with a French company and I left with a company that has the ability to become a world leader. The advice and feedback from great mentors, the discussion with all the 12 international founders, practical workshops on our product and positioning and the Silicon Valley spirit, all these things really show you that there is a formula you can follow to build a successful global company.

Girts Laudaks Latvia

April 2012 Alumn

In the past two weeks the picture of how to build a business got much clearer than during my last two years. There are many talented people gathered from all over the world in Silicon Valley, and you get to meet with them, listen to what they say and apply to your own business. People in the Valley gather experience which sums up in thousands of years of entrepreneurship and they are open to sharing it.

Agustin Badano Argentina

April 2012 Aulmn

Blackbox is a great experience! For two weeks I've been in the heart of Silicon Valley's ecosystem, meeting and learning from lots of entrepreneurs and investors. It blew my mind and helped me think really big. Don't miss it if you're an entrepreneur who wants to change the world.
